Hero.title: Your links,
Hero.description: Advanced link management platform with total control over behavior, customizable rules, and detailed analytics

Demos.title: See it in
Demos.subtitle: Real examples of intelligent links
Demos.demo1Description: Send mobile users to your app, desktop to your site
Demos.demo2Description: Gate your content behind passwords with custom hints
Demos.demo3Description: Detect country, device, VPN, bots and more automatically

Features.title: Everything you need
Features.subtitle: Three powerful features that make Linkkk the most flexible link management platform
Features.card1DescriptionShort: Skip the signup friction. Create up to 10 smart links instantly without email verification or passwords.
Features.card1DescriptionLong: Skip the signup friction. Create up to 10 smart links instantly without email verification or passwords. Perfect for quick campaigns, testing, or one-off projects. Your links stay active for 7 days with full rule capabilities.
Features.card2DescriptionShort: Build intelligent link behavior with our visual rules engine. Combine conditions and actions with zero coding.
Features.card2DescriptionLong: Build intelligent link behavior with our visual rules engine. Combine conditions like location, device type, time of day, or VPN detection with actions like custom redirects, password gates, or webhooks. No coding skills required just point, click, and create.
Features.card3DescriptionShort: Track visitor location, device info, browser details, and detect VPNs or bots automatically.
Features.card3DescriptionLong: Every click tells a story. Track visitor location, device info, browser details, and detect VPNs or bots automatically. Get insights into who's clicking, where they're from, and how they're engaging with your content.

GettingStarted.title: Choose how to
GettingStarted.subtitle: Get started free or upgrade to PRO

FinalCTA.title: Ready to take full control of your links?
FinalCTA.subtitle: Manage each link's behavior with total flexibility

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked
FAQ.answer1: Linkkk will always have a generous free plan that allows you to create up to 50 links with all essential features. If you need more, the PRO plan is designed to be affordable for everyone.
FAQ.answer2: Security is our priority. All your data is stored securely and encrypted. We never share your information with third parties.
FAQ.question3: What happens to my guest links when I sign up?
FAQ.answer3: When you register or log in, all the links you created as a guest are automatically transferred to your new account. You won't lose any links or their statistics.
FAQ.question4: How can I delete my data?
FAQ.answer4: You have full control over your data. From the Settings page, you can delete all your links or even your entire account permanently at any time.

Footer.brandDescription: Link management platform with total control over link behavior.

ErrorPage.description: We encountered an unexpected error while processing your request.
ErrorPage.infoBox: Don't worry! This error has been logged and we'll look into it. Please try again in a few moments.
ErrorPage.footerText: If the problem persists, please contact support.

PageBlocked.title: Access Blocked
PageBlocked.errorContactOwner: If you believe this is an error, please contact the link owner.

PageDisabled.title: Link Disabled
PageDisabled.ownerDisabled: This link has been temporarily disabled by its owner.
PageDisabled.infoBox: The link owner has paused this short link. It may be re-enabled in the future.
PageDisabled.ownerReEnable: If you're the link owner, you can re-enable it from your dashboard.

CancelSubscriptionModal.title: Cancel PRO Subscription
CancelSubscriptionModal.subtitle: Switch to STANDARD plan
CancelSubscriptionModal.warningMessage: This action will change your account to the STANDARD plan immediately.
CancelSubscriptionModal.consequence1: If you have more than 50 links, the oldest links will be permanently deleted
CancelSubscriptionModal.consequence2: If you have more than 3 rules per link, excess rules will be permanently deleted
CancelSubscriptionModal.consequence3: If you have more than 2 conditions per rule, excess conditions will be permanently deleted
CancelSubscriptionModal.consequence4: Access history older than 30 days will be permanently deleted
